original: yathā narttakī śṛṅgārādirasairhāsyādibhāvaiśca nibaddhagītādīni raṅgasya darśayitvā nivarttate kṛtārthatvāt tadvat /
analyzed: yathā narttakī śṛṅgāra ādi rasaiḥ hāsya ādi bhāvaiḥ ca nibaddha gīta ādīni raṅgasya darśayitvā nivarttate kṛtārtha tvāt tadvat

original: kiñca prakṛtirguṇavatī aguṇasya puṃsaḥ jagadyonibhāvena sukhaduḥkhamohātmakena śabdādiviṣayabhāvena
analyzed: kiñca prakṛtiḥ guṇavatī aguṇasya puṃsaḥ jagat yoni bhāvena sukha duḥkha moha ātmakena śabda ādi viṣaya bhāvena
vā iti evaṃvidhaiḥ upakāraiḥ anupakāriṇaḥ puruṣasya upakurvatī paścāt ātmānam prakāśya aham anyā

original: tvamanya iti nivartate sumitravat ātmanaḥ pratyupakāraṃ necchati /
analyzed: tvam anyaḥ iti nivartate sumitra vat ātmanaḥ pratyupakāram na icchati

original: sargasya neśvaraḥ kāraṇaṃ na svabhāvo na kālaḥ kālo 'pi yogināṃ kṣaṇarūpa eva na
analyzed: sargasya nā īśvaraḥ kāraṇam na svabhāvaḥ na kālaḥ kālaḥ api yoginām kṣaṇa rūpaḥ eva na

original: tu nyāyavaiśeṣikayorivātmavadakhaṇḍo nitya eko lāghavāt sa eva tattadupādyavacchinnaḥ
analyzed: tu nyāya vaiśeṣikayoḥ iva ātma vat akhaṇḍaḥ nityaḥ ekaḥ lāghavāt saḥ eva tad tad upādya avacchinnaḥ
san kṣaṇa muhūrta ādi vatsara antam vyavahāram karoti iti
na tu kṣaṇa nāmā pṛthak padārthaḥ asti iti

original: sāṃkhyaistu dikkālāvākāśādibhya iti sūtritaṃ mahākālo vā kṣaṇādirvā pṛthak padārtho nāsti kintvākāśamevopādhibhirviśiṣṭaṃ kṣaṇādimahākālāntavyavahāraṃ  #
analyzed: sāṃkhyaiḥ tu diś kālau ākāśa ādibhyaḥ iti sūtritam mahākālaḥ vā kṣaṇa ādiḥ vā pṛthak padārthaḥ na asti kintu ākāśam eva upādhibhiḥ viśiṣṭam kṣaṇa ādi mahākāla anta vyavahāram
kurute iti manyate

original: tadetanmatadvayamapyasamañjasamityāha yogī sthireṇa kenāpyupādhinā mahākālākāśābhyāṃ kṣaṇavyavahārasyāsambhavāt /
analyzed: tat etat mata dvayam api asamañjasam iti āha yogī sthireṇa kena api upādhinā mahākāla ākāśābhyām kṣaṇa vyavahārasya asambhavāt

original: tathāhi uttaradeśasaṃyogāvacchinnā paramāṇvādikriyā anyadvā etādṛśaṃ kiñcinmahākālākāśayoḥ
analyzed: tathā hi uttara deśa saṃyoga avacchinnā paramāṇu ādi kriyā anyat vā etādṛśam kiñcid mahākāla ākāśayoḥ

original: kṣaṇarūpatāyāmupādhiḥ parairiṣyate tatra uktaṃ saṃyogaviśiṣṭakriyādikaṃ cet viśeṣyaviśeṣaṇatatsambandhamātraṃ
analyzed: kṣaṇa rūpa tāyām upādhiḥ paraiḥ iṣyate tatra uktam saṃyoga viśiṣṭa kriyā ādikam ced viśeṣya viśeṣaṇa tad sambandha mātram

original: tarhi trayāṇāmaparaiḥ sthiratvābhyupagamāt na taiḥ kṣaṇavyavahāraḥ sambhavati yadi
analyzed: tarhi trayāṇām aparaiḥ sthira tva abhyupagamāt na taiḥ kṣaṇa vyavahāraḥ sambhavati yadi

original: ca tattebhyo 'tiriktamiṣyate na tu tanmahākāla ākāśaṃ vā tenaiva kṣaṇavyavahāropapattau
analyzed: ca tat tebhyaḥ atiriktam iṣyate na tu tat mahākālaḥ ākāśam vā tena eva kṣaṇa vyavahāra upapattau
tad avacchinnasya anyasya kṣaṇa vyavahāra hetu tva kalpanā vaiyarthyāt sa ca viśiṣṭa ādiḥ āsthiraḥ

original: kṣaṇaḥ prakṛterevātibhaṅguraḥ pariṇāmaviśeṣa ityato na prakṛtipuruṣātiriktatvāpattiḥ /
analyzed: kṣaṇaḥ prakṛteḥ eva ati bhaṅguraḥ pariṇāma viśeṣaḥ iti atas na prakṛti puruṣa atirikta tva āpattiḥ
tasya eva kṣaṇasya pracaya viśeṣaiḥ muhūrta ahar rātra ādiḥ dvi parārddha anta vyavahāraḥ bhavati

original: natvakhaṇḍo mahākālo 'sti pramāṇābhāvāt adyatyādivyavahāraḥ kṣaṇapracayenaiva kālanityatvaśrutismṛtayastu
analyzed: na tu akhaṇḍaḥ mahākālaḥ asti pramāṇa abhāvāt adyatyādi vyavahāraḥ kṣaṇa pracayena eva kāla nitya tva śruti smṛtayaḥ tu

original: pravāhanityatāparā iti tasmādāvaśyakatvāt kṣaṇātmaka eva kālo nākhaṇḍo mahākālo 'sti
analyzed: pravāha nityatā parāḥ iti tasmāt āvaśyaka tvāt kṣaṇa ātmakaḥ eva kālaḥ na akhaṇḍaḥ mahākālaḥ asti
na api ākāśam kāla vyavahāra hetuḥ iti kim tu pradhānam

original: puruṣo na badhyate na mucyate nāpi saṃsaratīti kiṃ tu nānāśrayā prakṛtireva tatheti sarvaṃ samañjasam //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ na badhyate na mucyate na api saṃsarati iti kim tu nānāśrayā prakṛtiḥ eva tathā iti sarvam samañjasam
iti kānyakubja śrī sima ānandadīkṣita viracitam sāṃkhyatattvavivecanam samāptam
